idare.metanode.internal.ColorManagement

Class ColorMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • idare.metanode.internal.ColorManagement.ColorMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public abstract class ColorMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A ColorMap provides an interface to a DataSet to obtain colors for specific values present in the DataSet.
    Author:
    Thomas Pfau
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getColor

        public abstract java.awt.Color getColor(java.lang.Comparable Value)
        Get the Color that is associated with the Comparable object provided.
        Parameters:
        Value - - A Comparable value.
        Returns:
        a Color

      • getPreferredColorScaleSize

        public java.awt.Dimension getPreferredColorScaleSize()
        Get the preferred size of this ColorMap. This is commonly the size of the optimal Legend Description width.
        Returns:
        The preferred Dimension

      • getDisplayStrings

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Double,java.lang.String> getDisplayStrings(java.lang.Double[] values)
        Provides appropriate (not too long) representations of the values provided. The input values have to be ordered from smallest to largest and it is assumed, that values[0] is the minimum and values[last] is the largest value.
        Parameters:
        values -
        Returns:
        A map matching Strings to the provided Double values.

      • setColorScale

        public abstract void setColorScale(ColorScale scale)
        Set a specific ColorScale to be used by this ColorMap. The Colormap will be reset to use the provided ColorScale.
        Parameters:
        scale - - the ColorScale to be used.

      • getColorScalePane

        public ColorScalePane getColorScalePane()
        Get a visual representation of the ColorScale used in this map. This is in fact, the ColorScalePane produced by the enclosed ColorScale
        Returns:
        a ColorScalePane that can be displayed.

      • getColorMapComponent

        public abstract javax.swing.JComponent getColorMapComponent()
        Get a Component that represents this ColorMap
        Returns:
        A JComponent that plots information about this ColorMap
